title: aria-rowcount attribute
description: Defines the total number of rows in a table, grid, or treegrid. See related aria-rowindex.

assertions.title: convey the total row count when all rows are visible
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know how many rows are in the whole grid / table

assertions.title: convey the total row count when some rows are hidden
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know how many rows are in the whole grid / table when some rows are hidden

assertions.title: convey a row count when total row count is unknown
assertions.rationale: Screen readers should not attempt to calculate the row count when it is unknown
